statements: SELECT * FROM employee_retention_rates;
SELECT name, department, hired_date FROM employee_retention_rates;
SELECT employee_id, name, gender, retention_status FROM employee_retention_rates WHERE department='Sales';
SELECT * FROM employee_retention_rates WHERE retention_status=true;
SELECT employee_id, name, ethnicity FROM employee_retention_rates ORDER BY ethnicity, employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_retention_rates ORDER BY hired_date DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employee_retention_rates WHERE gender='Female' AND retention_status=true;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employee_retention_rates;
SELECT name, MAX(hired_date) AS latest_hire_date FROM employee_retention_rates GROUP BY name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employee_retention_rates WHERE ethnicity='Caucasian';
SELECT * FROM retention_rates ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM retention_rates WHERE termination_date IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, termination_date FROM retention_rates WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, retention_rate FROM retention_rates WHERE retention_rate >= 80;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM underrepresented_groups ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM retention_rates ORDER BY hire_date DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM retention_rates WHERE termination_date IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, retention_rate FROM retention_rates WHERE hire_date <= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY retention_rate DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM retention_rates WHERE termination_date IS NOT NULL AND retention_rate > 80;

SELECT rr.employee_id, rr.employee_name, rr.hire_date, ug.group_name FROM retention_rates rr JOIN underrepresented_groups ug ON rr.employee_id = ug.group_id ORDER BY rr.hire_date ASC, ug.group_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM retention_rates WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT name, gender FROM employee_details WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT employee_id, starting_date, ending_date FROM retention_rates WHERE underrepresented_group = true;
SELECT * FROM employee_details WHERE race = 'Asian' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM underrepresented_groups WHERE group_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM retention_rates WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT name, gender, race FROM employee_details WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(retention_rate) AS average_retention_rate FROM retention_rates WHERE underrepresented_group = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, name, underrepresented_group FROM employee_details JOIN retention_rates ON employee_details.employee_id = retention_rates.employee_id;

SELECT group_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM underrepresented_groups JOIN employee_details ON underrepresented_groups.group_id = employee_details.employee_id GROUP BY group_name ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics ORDER BY employee_id
SELECT gender, hire_date FROM employee_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT group_id, group_name FROM underrepresented_groups ORDER BY group_id DESC
SELECT employee_id, retention_rate FROM retention_rates WHERE retention_rate > 0.8
SELECT * FROM employee_groups ORDER BY group_id
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT employee_id, ethnicity FROM employee_demographics WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, gender, ethnicity, hire_date FROM employee_demographics ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT ed.employee_id, er.retention_rate FROM employee_demographics ed INNER JOIN retention_rates er ON ed.employee_id = er.employee_id;
SELECT eg.group_id, eg.employee_id, u.group_name FROM employee_groups eg LEFT JOIN underrepresented_groups u ON eg.group_id = u.group_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRetention;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM EmployeeRetention ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, gender, ethnicity, retention_rate FROM EmployeeRetention WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT employee_id, gender, ethnicity, age FROM EmployeeDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score, promotion_status, manager_id FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE promotion_status=True AND department='Sales';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, gender FROM EmployeeRetention WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT employee_name, ethnicity, retention_rate FROM EmployeeRetention JOIN EmployeeDemographics ON EmployeeRetention.employee_id = EmployeeDemographics.employee_id WHERE EmployeeRetention.retention_rate > 0.8 AND EmployeeDemographics.ethnicity = 'Asian' ORDER BY retention_rate DESC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score, promotion_status, department FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE promotion_status = TRUE AND department = 'Sales' ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT e.employee_name, f.feedback_text, f.feedback_date FROM EmployeeRetention e JOIN EmployeeFeedback f ON e.employee_id = f.employee_id WHERE f.feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT EP.employee_id, EP.promotion_date, EP.promotion_type, EP.previous_position, ED.education FROM EmployeePromotion EP JOIN EmployeeDemographics ED ON EP.employee_id = ED.employee_id WHERE EP.promotion_type = 'Senior' AND ED.education = 'Master's Degree' ORDER BY EP.promotion_date DESC;
